Smart Office

Urządzenie monitorujące środowisko biurowe

About the project

The project serves the purpose of monitoring environmental parameters such as temperature, humidity, co2 quantity and air quality in the office and also monitors the presence of people in a given room. The modules are based on ESP32 wroom processor, which is connected to the network in the office. The module cyclically sends information from the sensors via I2C interface. The program, unlike others, is not pure BareMetal but has been implemented real-time operating system FreeRtos. The server part deals with the processing and presentation of data to the user. In the second version of the project, which is visible in the photo is under development. The second version, in addition to the monitoring of the presence of people, has to control an information panel, which will be located in front of a room (such as a conference room)

PCB version 2

The board has been designed in a circular shape because it is to be mounted in a housing with a transparent dome. 3W LEDs have also been installed to illuminate the devices to indicate the occupancy of the room, where there will be no information panel.

By Mateusz Janus
